p: See Giddings, ‘Supporting Social Justice’ (n 36); ‘The Importance of Effective Supervision’ in Evans et al., Australian Clinical Legal Education (n 32) Chapter 2; Michael McNamara and Jeff Giddings, ‘Constructive Supervision in Regional, Rural and Remote Legal Practice’ in Amanda Kennedy, Trish Mundy, and Jennifer Nielsen (eds), The Place of Practice: Lawyering in Rural and Regional Australia (Federation Press 2017) 219; Jeff Giddings and Michael McNamara, ‘Preparing Generations of Future Lawyers for Legal Practice: What’s Supervision Got to Do with It?’ (2014) 37(3) University of New South Wales Law Journal 1226.
